Comment: Added ability to turn led lights on after print is done
Added support for the M997 Command on new control board
Added support for redundant sensor when signlenozzle
Added support to invert analog joystick values
Added support for Serial 2 on new control board
Added support to save more axis homing thresholds to EEPROM
Added support for TMCStepper to specifc printer
Added Marlin Color UI to STM32F1
Added new menus in Touch UI for BLTouch controls
Added support for dummy thermistors without pin definition
Added abilty to hide files on sdcard
Added probe temperature compenstation to more commands
Added ability to change bed dimensions at run time for polargraph
